article.title: Libraries of the Future
article.author: Licklider, J.C.R.
article.text: This report of research on concepts and problems of "Libraries of the Future" records the result of a two-year inquiry into the applicability of some of the newer techniques for handling information to what goes at present by the name of library work - i.e, the operations connected with assembling information in recorded form and of organizing and making it available for use.
